transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I assist you in your emergency?
Hi, I need urgent help. I am experiencing severe abdominal pain.
Can you confirm your name and date of birth for identity verification?
My name is Kristina Duncan and I was born on December 02, 1947.
Thank you, Kristina Duncan. I've located your records. Let me assist you immediately.
Please stay calm. I am arranging an ambulance for your severe abdominal pain. Is there someone with you?
Good. Ensure they keep you comfortable. The ambulance will arrive shortly. Please stay on the line for any updates.
